definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: China's water transport has a long history. Early in the Shang Dynasty (1600 -1046 BC) there were sailing boats.
sentences.chinese: 中国水运的发展历史十分悠久，远在商代就有了帆船。

sentences.english: A water transport network connecting trunk and branch lines has been established.
sentences.chinese: 初步形成干支衔接的水运网。

sentences.english: Underwater reef blasting has been extensively employed in marine traffic engineering.
sentences.chinese: 水下炸礁爆破在水运工程中有着广泛的应用。

sentences.english: Qiaogong Hydropower Station falls on the lower reach of Hongshui river, the key river section for navigation.
sentences.chinese: 桥巩水电站位于红水河下游，是该河流的重要水运段。

sentences.english: Why shipment unable to release around 12noon on 14/June?
sentences.chinese: 为何在六月14号中午12点的时候水运不开放呢？

sentences.english: The company typically gets a shipment of gears from Japan every other day.
sentences.chinese: 日野公司每隔一天还收到从日本水运而来的零件。

sentences.english: This is the Changsha Water Tongjiang Dahai important channel.
sentences.chinese: 这是长沙水运通江达海的重要通道。

sentences.english: Evaluation on Influence of underwater reef explosion in fishery resource in channel project of Tiaozhoumen Harbor Area;
sentences.chinese: 水下炸礁爆破在水运工程中有着广泛的应用。

sentences.english: The application of the technique for studying the problems in water transport engin…
sentences.chinese: 介绍了这项技术在水运工程研究中的应用及发展前景。
